message_1: What is the balanced equation for the precipitation reaction that occurs when aqueous solutions of sodium chloride and silver nitrate are mixed together?
message_2:
When aqueous solutions of sodium chloride (NaCl) and silver nitrate (AgNO3) are mixed together, a precipitation reaction occurs, forming silver chloride (AgCl) and sodium nitrate (NaNO3). The balanced equation for this reaction is:

NaCl(aq) + AgNO3(aq) â†’ AgCl(s) + NaNO3(aq)
